CutSceneText.Text: I have come to find you.
How did you know I was here...?
Someone gave me this letter to show to you and return with you.
Hm, this letter is... It's dark and I can't really see it well, but...
Great! The [Tower of Light] is finally stirring.
Thank you. I was almost reaching the end of my patience hiding out here...
There is a secret passage leading to the basement of this manor.
Oh... You know things about the [Ruined Barat Manor] that hardly any people know about.
I heard a few stories about it.
